item.title: 6343274075_8493ae76c6_o
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: His tiny workshop is in the backyard of Little Hagia Sophia, we discovered it by accident. We bought handmade earrings and two rose pendants from him and could watch while they were finished. After that, he invited us for a cup of Chai and explained how he became a mother of pearl artist.Rolleiflex SL66 medium format camera Carl Zeiss Rollei-HFT Planar 2.8/80 lens Kodak Portra 400 film Scan from negative @2400dpi
